DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine fix dose heparin infusion rate 500 units/hour sufficient maintain target anti-Xa 0.1-0.35 IU/mL VTE prophylaxis patient undergo microvascular surgery . Additionally , pilot protocol develop titrate heparin infusion ensure patient sufficient VTE prophylaxis . All patient enrol observational arm study receive anti-Xa level monitoring . Patients out-of-range anti-Xa level cross interventional arm study receive real time heparin infusion dose adjustment per pilot protocol . The primary outcome measure percentage patient anti-Xa level target range 0.1-0.35 IU/mL heparin infusion 500 units/hour .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Anti-Xa Levels Surgery Patients Receiving Fixed Dose Heparin
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo surgical procedure Initiation heparin infusion rate 500 units/hour intraoperatively postoperatively Age < 18 year old Pregnant Incarcerated Mentally disable
